modules.description: This module provides syntactic extensions for Lwt programming, enabling concise handling of asynchronous operations using `let%lwt`, `match%lwt`, and similar constructs. It works with Lwt's `('a, 'b) result` type and Lwt threads (`'a Lwt.t`). Concrete use cases include simplifying chains of asynchronous computations, such as reading from a socket or handling concurrent I/O operations, without deeply nested callbacks.
